about_the_game:
A private investigator, hot on the trail of a missing person, stumbles upon a conspiracy of zealots lurking in the city's hidden underworld. Neon Hearts City is a retro point-and-click adventure that thrusts you into a grungy cyberpunk city of the future.

While searching for Audrey, a missing young girl, Elijah Crow uncovers a sinister plot targeting society’s outcasts.

Somewhere along the shore, androids longing to become human are offered as sacrifices.

Far out at sea, a mysterious tower harbors secrets that could unravel the fabric of civilization.

Suspended in the sky, Roark Prison looms—a colossal airship where thought criminals face imprisonment.

Somehow, these threads are inextricably intertwined.

Game features

• Immersive cyberpunk pixel art.

• Play as a private detective.

• Explore the dystopian city of the future.

• Aid hunted-down androids.

• Point and click puzzles & item inventory.

• Steam achievements!.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains pixelated deaths, mild profanity, veiled nudity.
